DOC.HEADLINE: VICTOR LOMBARDO ; BANDLEADER , PERFORMED WITH ROYAL CANADIANS
DOC.TEXT: Victor Lombardo , 82 , youngest brother of musician Guy Lombardo and a bandleader in his own_right . A native of London , Canada , the younger Lombardo was a featured performer in hundreds of recordings and musical films in the 1930s and 1940s.He was the saxophone soloist in his brother ' s Royal Canadians and briefly took_over the band ' s direction after Guy died in 1977 . Bearing a close resemblance to his brother , Victor Lombardo soothed television viewers by fronting the Canadians at their annual appearance at New York ' s Waldorf Astoria Hotel for the 1977 New Year ' s Eve . But Victor soon left over " little differences " with another brother , Lebert , and formed his own band . On Saturday in Boca Raton , Fla. , of complications of asthma .
